metadata.description: Specify the name of your existing OMS Automation account to store the configuration
Specify the region for your OMS workspace
Specify the name of your Automation Account
Specify region for your automation account
Select SKU for the Log Analytics workspace

jobGuid.defaultValue: Use Powershell and run 'New-Guid' to get the GUID

metadata.description: GUID for the schedule creation - create a unique before deploy

OMSWorkspaceId.name: OMSWorkspaceId
OMSWorkspaceId.description: Workspace ID for the Log Analytics workspace

OMSWorkspaceKey.name: OMSWorkspaceKey
OMSWorkspaceKey.description: Primary key for the Log Analytics workspace

OMSAutomationAccountName.name: OMSAutomationAccountName
OMSAutomationAccountName.description: Name of the linked Automation account

OMSResourceGroupName.name: OMSResourceGroupName
OMSResourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource Group containing the OMS services

armManagement.name: azureMgmtAnalytics
armManagement.description: OMS runbook to capture ARM data into OMS Log Analytics

Tile.Query: AzureManagement_CL  | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(TenantId) by TenantId | count

List.Query: AzureManagement_CL  | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(SubscriptionId) by TenantId | sort by AggregatedValue
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Tile.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Resources" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(SubscriptionId) by SubscriptionId| count // Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure countdistinct (SubscriptionId) by SubscriptionId

SecondTile.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Resources" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(Location_s) by Location_s| count // Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure countdistinct (Location_s) by Location_s

List.Query: AzureManagement_CL  | where Log_s == "Resources"  | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(ResourceId) by Location_s, SubscriptionId | sort by AggregatedValue
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Donut.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Deployments" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(CorrelationId) by ProvisioningState_s | sort by AggregatedValue desc | where isnotempty(ProvisioningState_s)  // Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Deployments | measure countdistinct (CorrelationId) by ProvisioningState_s

List.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Deployments" and (ProvisioningState_s == "Failed" or ProvisioningState_s == "Canceled") | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s | project DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s// Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Deployments AND (ProvisioningState_s:Failed OR ProvisioningState_s:Canceled) | measure count () by DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s | select DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Donut.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Deployments" | where DeploymentName_s !contains "Microsoft"  | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(CorrelationId) by ProvisioningState_s | sort by AggregatedValue desc | where isnotempty(ProvisioningState_s) // Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Deployments | measure countdistinct (CorrelationId) by ProvisioningState_s

List.Query: AzureManagement_CL  | where Log_s == "Deployments" and (ProvisioningState_s == "Failed" or ProvisioningState_s == "Canceled") and DeploymentName_s !contains "Microsoft" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s  | project DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Donut.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Deployments" | where DeploymentName_s contains "Microsoft"  | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(CorrelationId) by ProvisioningState_s | sort by AggregatedValue desc | where isnotempty(ProvisioningState_s)

List.Query: AzureManagement_CL  | where Log_s == "Deployments" and (ProvisioningState_s == "Failed" or ProvisioningState_s == "Canceled") and DeploymentName_s contains "Microsoft" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s  | project DeploymentName_s, ResourceGroupName_s, ProvisioningState_s
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Tile.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Resources" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(ResourceId) by ResourceName_s| count // Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure countdistinct (ResourceId) by ResourceName_s

SecondTile.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Resources" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by ResourceType| count // Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Resources | measure count () by ResourceType

List.Query: AzureManagement_CL  | where Log_s == "Resources"  | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(ResourceId) by ResourceType | sort by AggregatedValue
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Tile.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Lock" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(LockId_s) by ResourceType, ResourceName_s| count // Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Lock | measure countdistinct (LockId_s) by ResourceType, ResourceName_s

List.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Lock" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(LockId_s) by ResourceName_s, ResourceType | project ResourceName_s, ResourceType// Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Lock | measure countdistinct (LockId_s) by ResourceName_s, ResourceType | Select ResourceName_s, ResourceType
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Donut.Query: AzureManagement_CL | where Log_s == "Deployments" | summarize AggregatedValue = dcount(CorrelationId) by ProvisioningState_s | sort by AggregatedValue desc | where isnotempty(ProvisioningState_s)  // Oql: Type:AzureManagement_CL Log_s:Deployments | measure countdistinct (CorrelationId) by ProvisioningState_s
